Text: The Electric Market Forecasting Conference has been rescheduled for November th th We have rescheduled the Electric Market Forecasting Conference for November th th This has been a difficult time for all of us and we are grateful for the overwhelming support offered by our speakers toward the goal of rescheduling this conference To assist with travel and hotel planning the following items have been attached Conference Agenda Activities in and around the Columbia Gorge Accommodations olebmp We ask that you make your own reservations at Skamania Lodge or the Columbia River Inn in Cascade Locks OREGON next to the Bridge of the Gods Skamania Lodge To reserve a room call Mention EPIS to get the block room rate Best Western Columbia River Inn at Cascade Locks OREGON This Inn is just five minutes awayacross the Bridge of the Gods on the Oregon side of the Columbia River To reserve a room call direct Mention EPIS to get block room rate For suggestions on other accommodations please call EPIS at x If it is not possible for you to attend the rescheduled conference just email or call in your cancellation and we will refund your conference fee Once again many thanks to our speakers and participants for your commitment to this conference Conference Agendadoc Activitiesdoc olebmp Conference Agendadoc Activitiesdoc
